p.em: This section displays the Personal information for the consumer. Included here is ID or Passport, Name, Gender, Marital Status.
This section displays information verified by Home Affairs and the SAFPS.

td.strong: ID No. Verified Status At Home Affairs
ID No. Deceased Status At Home Affairs
ID No. Found on Fraud Database
ID No. Found on Employer Fraud Database
ID No. Found on Protective Register

p.em: This section displays a summary of all the consumerâ€™s current debt obligations, legal enforcement action taken, Court Notices, enquiries done on this consumer by credit providers and debt counselling information.

td.strong: Enquiries Done in the last 90 days
Accounts opened within the last 45 days

p.em: This section includes 24 month payment behaviour of all credit agreements as reported by the Credit Grantors belonging to Credit Providers Association (CPA).

div.strong: Payment Profile: National Loan Register - NLR

p.em: This section includes 24 month payment behaviour of all credit agreements as reported by Micro Lenders as part of the National Loans Register (NLR).
This section details all Legal enforcement action taken on you by the your Credit or Service Providers
AdverseDefaults
XDS Default Listing
Court's notice Judgements, Administration orders, Provision Sequestrations, Final Sequestrations, Prohabition Order, Debt Review Orders
This section details information on the Rehabilitation Order that was granted after all debts as per the Sequestration Oder were paid up.
This section details information on the Rehabilitation Order that was granted after all debts as per the Sequestration Oder were paid up.
This section displays information of Credit or Service Providers who require that you contact them.
This section includes a list of organisations or credit providers who have requested your Credit Report. Enquiry Date.
This section list the last three sets of contact information provided on you by Credit or Service Providers.
Address History
Contact Number History
This section displays a list of address, contact and employment information received from various XDS sources and has been confirmed with you at a point in time.
Confirmed Address History
Confirmed Contact No. History
Confirmed Employment History
This section displays additional contact information, whereby XDS match that your contact numbers are linked to other individuals.
Home Linkage Information
Work Linkage Information
Cellular Linkage Information
This section displays a list of your Employers.
This section displays a list of properties registered in the name of the consumer at the Deeds offices around SA.
This section displays a list of companies where the Consumer is linked as a Principal at CIPC.
